short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track anyone on Twitter and make notes on their profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Based on the immutable internal identifier, you can add a memo to the Twitter profile page of anyone you choose. Even if the user changes their Twitter nickname or screen name (starting with "@"), the memo will remain valid. 
This extension provides following features.
1. You can add the memo to see it on Twitter profile page.
2. You can open the popup page of this extension page.
2-1. You can add the memo in the popup page
2-2. You can view the whole list of the memos and ids you've written.
2-3. You can visit profile page by clicking the button in the list.

This extension does NOT provides following features.
1.You CANNOT delete all memo by one click. You should remove and re-install to delete all memo.
2. You CANNOT see memo on the other twitter pages(e.g. feed, home). Twitter policy does not allows it.
3. You CANNOT see the screen name on the memo list.
